entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is the one who said 'You'll see. We're here.' and led Harry through a passage.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character who followed Neville through the passage.

entities.name: ariana
entities.description: Ariana's portrait is mentioned as hiding a door that Neville pushed open.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is one of Harry's friends who was hugged and pounded on the back by many people.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is another one of Harry's friends who was hugged and shaken hands with by many people.

relationships.description: Neville led Harry through a passage.
Ariana's portrait hid the door that Neville pushed open.
